languages.text: "Эта башня древнее, чем сам замок! Поговаривают, что сам Император вытянул ее из земли, а за ней и всю горную гряду".
"That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."
languages.original_text: "Эта башня древнее, чем сам замок! Поговаривают, что сам Император вытянул ее из земли, а за ней и всю горную гряду".

traits.locale_text: "That tower is more ancient than even the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."
"That tower is more ancient than even the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."
"That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."
"That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."
"That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."
"That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."

languages.text: 「あの塔は、城よりもさらに古いのですよ！皇帝陛下ご自身が、あの山脈ごと地面から引き抜いたのですって…そう語り継がれています」
languages.original_text: "That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."

traits.locale_text: 「あの塔は、城よりもさらに古いのですよ！皇帝陛下ご自身が、あの山脈ごと地面から引き抜いたのですって…そう語り継がれています」

languages.text: "O kule, kaleden bile daha eski! İmparator Hazretleri, tüm dağ menziliyle birlikte yerden bizzat yükseltmiş diyorlar."
languages.original_text: "That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."

traits.locale_text: "O kule, kaleden bile daha eski! İmparator Hazretleri tüm dağ menziliyle birlikte yerden bizzat yükseltmiş diyorlar."

languages.text: «¡Esa torre es más antigua aún que el castillo! Dicen que el mismísimo Emperador la arrancó del suelo junto con la cordillera entera».
languages.original_text: "That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."

traits.locale_text: «¡Esa torre es más antigua aún que el castillo! Dicen que el mismísimo Emperador la arrancó del suelo junto con la cordillera entera».

languages.text: “那座高塔甚至比城堡还要古老！大家都说，是帝皇本人亲自把那座塔连同整个山脉一起，从地里拔了出来。”
languages.original_text: "That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."

traits.locale_text: “那座高塔甚至比城堡还要古老！大家都说，是帝皇本人亲自把那座塔连同整个山脉一起，从地里拔了出来。”

languages.text: « Cette tour est encore plus ancienne que le château ! On raconte que l'Empereur Lui-même l'aurait fait sortir de terre, en même temps que la chaîne de montagnes tout entière. »
languages.original_text: "That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."

traits.locale_text: « Cette tour est encore plus ancienne que le château ! On raconte que l'Empereur Lui-même l'aurait fait sortir de terre, en même temps que la chaîne de montagnes tout entière. »

languages.text: "Dieser Turm ist noch älter als die Burg! Es heißt, der Imperator Selbst habe ihn und den gesamten Gebirgszug aus dem Boden wachsen lassen."
languages.original_text: "That tower is even more ancient than the castle! They say the Emperor Himself pulled it out of the ground, along with the entire mountain range."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Turm ist noch älter als die Burg! Es heißt, der Imperator Selbst habe ihn und den gesamten Gebirgszug aus dem Boden wachsen lassen."
